Things go wrong. It’s a fact that we have to embrace and learn to live with if we want to be great teachers. I’ve learned some of my most valuable teaching lessons from classes or activities melting down in front of me. Adversity is inevitable when we work with other people. Venus Flyby

Flickr CC, howzey Tuesday, June 5th and Wednesday, June 6th, we have a great opportunity to see the planet Venus travel across the face of the sun. This event is called a transit and it is significant because of the timeframe between each event. It is over 100 years between each transit, but they come in pairs eight years apart....
